scripts.dev: npm run ensure:env && npm --workspace apps/web run dev
scripts.dev:api: echo 'API is now integrated into Next.js'
scripts.ensure:venv: echo 'Python venv no longer needed with Next.js'
scripts.postinstall: npm run ensure:env && npm --workspace apps/web run prisma:generate
scripts.dev:desktop: cross-env BROWSER=none concurrently --raw "npm --workspace apps/web run dev" "node scripts/wait-web.js && npm --workspace apps/desktop run start"
scripts.build:desktop: npm --workspace apps/web run build && npm --workspace apps/desktop run dist
